attributes.action: we need to scrap all bank charges asap
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i was charged £40 because i never had enough money to transfer from one of my halifax accounts to another of my saving accounts,  how are the allowed to charge you to move own money???
   what will happen if everyone decided to close there accounts and  keep money in there homes?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
